p: A method based on drying was performed only for sludge samples according to Murphy et al. ( 2016). In part I, spiked sludge samples were poured into petri dishes and oven-dried at 45 Â°C for 19 h. In contrast to other samples, these samples were examined three times under the digital optical microscope and small amount of distilled water was added to break down the sludge material during examination.
